entry.tran: 西方的;西部的;来自西部的
entry.def: Western means in or from the west of a region, state, or country.

example.ex: ...hand-made rugs from Western and Central Asia.
example.tran: 来自西亚和中亚的手工小地毯
位于肯尼亚西部的莫恩大学

entry.def: Western is used to describe things, people, ideas, or ways of life that come from or are associated with the United States, Canada, and the countries of Western, Northern, and Southern Europe.

example.ex: Mexico had the support of the big western governments...
example.tran: 墨西哥拥有西方大国的支持。

example.ex: Those statements have never been reported in the Western media.
example.tran: 那些言论似乎从来没有被西方媒体报道过。

entry.tran: (关于19世纪美国西部生活，尤指牛仔生活的)西部电影(或小说)
entry.def: A western is a book or film about life in the west of America in the nineteenth century, especially the lives of cowboys.

means.word_mean: 1. a sandwich made from a western omelet
1. relating to or characteristic of regions of western parts of the world;
2. lying in or toward the west
3. of or characteristic of regions of the United States west of the Mississippi River;
4. lying toward or situated in the west;

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"……方向的"; 2. 表名词,"……场所"

stems_affixes.word_buile: east东+ern……方向的→adj.东方的,东部的
northeast东北+ern……方向的→adj.东北方的,来自东北的
north北+ern……方向的→adj.北方的,北部的
northwest西北+ern……方向的→adj.西北方的,来自西北的
south南+ern……方向的→adj.南方的,南部的
southwest西南+ern……方向的→adj.西南的,来自西南的
west西+ern……方向的→adj.西方的,西部的
cist箱子+ern……场所→n.[抽水马桶的]贮水池
lect讲话+ern……场所→n.[教堂中的]诵经台

Sentence.sentence: In modern western societies, however, the focus on individuality and independence means that people are less concerned about conforming to (遵守) the dictates of family and culture.
W : We mainly deal with large volume buyers from western countries and our products have been well received.
in Western Europe, reports economist Robert Stein in the journal National Affairs.
We can tear apart the great grass cover of the western plains and pour toxic chemicals into the soil until the soil is dead and blows away in the wind.
And in fact our admiration for the comically gifted is relatively new and not very well-founded, says Rod Martin's a psychologist at the University of Western Ontario.

means.word_mean: 西方的, 西部的; 在西方的, 在西部的

sentences.en: He is wearing a western style suit.
This philosophy is western in origin.

jushi.english: Kate's house was on the western outskirts of the town.
jushi.chinese: 凯特的家在该城的西郊。

jushi.english: The region covers the Southern two-thirds of Brazil and Western Bolivia.
jushi.chinese: 这一地区覆盖了巴西南部三分之二的土地面积和西玻利维亚。

jushi.english: When we are in Russia,England is a western country.
jushi.chinese: 当我们在俄国的时候,英国是一个西方的国家。
